attributes.action: To sack Tessa Jowell,Minister for the Olympics for allowing Chinese bodyguards during London Olympic torch relay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chinese bodyguards were allowed to "guard the recent Olympic Torch Relay through the City of London.It's an Olympic torch not a  Chinese torch.No country has exclusive rights to it.This was absolutely disgraceful,considering the situation in Tibet and the dictatorship of China overruling another country's security.
